title: Is it true that there is no Shyness in religion? Asking intimate questions - Assim al hakeem
transcript: as there is no shyness in religion this statement is wrong religion is based on shyness the Prophet said Alice salat wa salam that shyness is a branch of Eman so it is inappropriate to say there is no shyness in Islam on the contrary Islam is all shyness but you may say in Allah Allah esther haman and Huck Allah is not bashful of truth and this is the best introduction to such questions that Allah is that bashful of the truth is it permissible to have intimacy between the spouses while fasting
